intents.short_response: We offer Free, Pro, and Enterprise plans. Free tier includes 1000 API calls/month.
intents.detailed_response:
Our Pricing Plans:

üìã FREE PLAN
  - 1,000 API calls/month
  - Community support
  - Pre-trained models only
  - 1 user account
  - 1 GB storage
  - Price: $0/month

üíº PRO PLAN
  - 100,000 API calls/month
  - Email support (24h response)
  - Custom model training
  - 5 user accounts
  - 100 GB storage
  - Price: $99/month (billed annually: $990)

üè¢ ENTERPRISE PLAN
  - Unlimited API calls
  - Priority 24/7 phone support
  - Dedicated account manager
  - Unlimited users
  - Unlimited storage
  - Custom SLA
  - Price: Custom (contact sales)

‚ú® ADD-ONS
  - Advanced Analytics: +$50/month
  - Priority Support: +$100/month
  - GPU Acceleration: +$200/month
  - Data Backup: +$25/month

‚ùì FAQ:
  - Cancel anytime (month-to-month)
  - No setup fees
  - 14-day free trial for Pro
  - Volume discounts available

View detailed comparison: https://example.com/pricing

intents.short_response: You can manage billing and view invoices in your account dashboard.
intents.detailed_response:
Billing Information:

1. Payment Methods:
   - Credit card (Visa, Mastercard, AmEx)
   - PayPal
   - Bank transfer (for Enterprise)

2. Invoices:
   - Available in your account dashboard
   - Automatic email delivery
   - Download as PDF
   - Detailed line items

3. Billing Cycle:
   - Monthly billing (default)
   - Annual billing (save 15%)
   - Pro-rata charges for plan changes

4. Account Management:
   - Update payment method anytime
   - Download invoices
   - View usage metrics
   - Adjust plan anytime

5. Billing FAQ:
   - When am I charged? ‚Üí 1st of each month
   - How do refunds work? ‚Üí Pro-rata refunds within 30 days
   - Can I change my plan? ‚Üí Yes, changes effective next billing cycle
   - Invoice format? ‚Üí PDF emailed automatically

Manage billing: https://dashboard.example.com/billing
